org.gearvrf.jassimp

Class AiMaterial.Property

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.jassimp.AiMaterial.Property
  • Enclosing class:
    AiMaterial

    public static final class AiMaterial.Property
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure for a single material property.

    As an user, you'll probably never need to deal with this data structure. Just use the provided get() family of functions to query material properties easily.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      int getIndex()
      Textures: Specifies the index of the texture.
      java.lang.String getKey()

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        public java.lang.String getKey()
        Returns the key of the property.

        Keys are generally case insensitive.

        Returns:
        the key

      • getSemantic

        public int getSemantic()
        Textures: Specifies their exact usage semantic. For non-texture properties, this member is always 0 (or, better-said, #aiTextureType_NONE).
        Returns:
        the semantic

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Textures: Specifies the index of the texture. For non-texture properties, this member is always 0.
        Returns:
        the index

      • getType

        public AiMaterial.PropertyType getType()
        Type information for the property.

        Defines the data layout inside the data buffer. This is used by the library internally to perform debug checks and to utilize proper type conversions. (It's probably a hacky solution, but it works.)

        Returns:
        the type
